summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the Director of Engineering to execute an agreement with the Procter and Gamble Company for financial assistance for the recycling disposable diapers study; authorizing the acceptance of those funds when received; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1989 Budget of the Engineering Department; making partially reimbursable appropriations from the Engineering Department Operating and Solid Waste Funds therefor; ;and authorizing agreements for such study.
